mapper.select: SELECT #{id} as NOTI_ID ,CASE WHEN INSTR(filename, '공고문') > 0 then '공고문' WHEN INSTR(filename, '내역서') > 0 then '내역서' WHEN INSTR(filename, '유의서') > 0 then '유의서' WHEN INSTR(filename, '안내서') > 0 then '안내서' ELSE '' END as fileDstnctNm, fileName as fileNm, filePath as filePathNm, 'N' as extrnlfileyn FROM NoticeTables.S_NoticeFile WHERE KeyBaseTable = #{prfId}
